```{r}
avg_data2 = aggregate(PercievedStressScore ~ ID, EMA1, mean) %>% 
  glimpse()

left_joined <- left_join(avg_data2, obstetric_disease2, by = "ID")
#PercievedStressScore.x

#group_by 
avg_data1 <- group_by(EMA1, ID) %>%
  summarize(mean(PercievedStressScore)) #this did the same thing as the aggregate function

obstetric_disease1 <- group_by(EMA1, t0_obstet_hist1___99) %>%
  obstetric_disease2 <- EMA1[!duplicated(EMA1$ID),]
  summarize(min(t0_obstet_hist1___99)) %>%
  View(obstetric_disease1)
reshape(obstetric_disease1)#1 would keep the first row

#cross sectional analysis at baseline
```
